turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hey, I'm looking for some new games to play. I really enjoy RPGs, but I'm finding it hard to find anything new that catches my eye. Any recommendations?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Ugh, yes, I've played all of those! And loved them, obviously. It's hard to find something that good again. I also like action RPGs and games with a good story. Something a bit more... unique? Not just the same old fantasy tropes.
